name: Reservoir
description: Reservoir Contract. This contract must be poked via the `drip()` function every so often. Distributes a token to a different contract at a fixed rate.

functionDecorators.name: drip
functionDecorators.description: Drips the maximum amount of tokens to match the drip rate since inception. Note: this will only drip up to the amount of tokens available.

returnDecorators.description: The amount of tokens dripped in this call.

functionDecorators.name: dripRate
functionDecorators.description: Tokens per block that to drip to target (immutable).

functionDecorators.name: dripStart
functionDecorators.description: The block number when the Reservoir started (immutable).

functionDecorators.name: dripped
functionDecorators.description: Amount that has already been dripped.
